Title: Scaffolder for WPF
Description: The Wpf Scaffolder is a control that generates quick, flexible UI based on POCO objects and attributes.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Wpf Scaffolder is a control that lets you create simply UI based on entities (a lá Dynamic Data). The control highly relies on attributes from System.Component like
  • DisplayName
  • Bindable
  • ListBindable
  • ComplexBindingProperties

You can specify your POCO like this

public class Product
{
        [DisplayName("Product Name")]
        [Bindable(true)]
        public string ProductName { get; set; }

        public int ID { get; set; }

        [DisplayName("Quantity")]
        [Bindable(true)]
        public int Quantity { get; set; }

        [DisplayName("Attributes")]
        [ListBindable(true)]
        public List<string> Attributes { get; set; }
}
